title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2970/95 of 19 December 1995 fixing the reference prices for fishery products for the 1996 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EC) No 2970/95 of 19 December 1995 fixing the reference prices for fishery products for  the 1996 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The reference prices for the 1996 fishing year for the products  specified in Annexes I, II, III, IV (A), (B) and V to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 shall be as shown  in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1995.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
